name: finance-reconciler
description: Privacy-first personal finance tracker. Import bank transactions, auto-categorize spending, manage budgets, query finances with natural language, and generate reports. All data stays local in SQLite.

FINANCE_DATA_DIR.description: Directory to store the SQLite database. Defaults to ~/.openclaw/skills/finance-reconciler/data

install.all: pip install pandas ofxparse tabulate python-dateutil
install.macos: pip3 install pandas ofxparse tabulate python-dateutil
install.linux: pip3 install pandas ofxparse tabulate python-dateutil
install.windows: pip install pandas ofxparse tabulate python-dateutil
